item.title: About
item.description: Orin (aka Sleepmode) I’m an Australian video game enthusiast with a particular love of fighting games and arcade-style tests of skill. This place is usually where you can find me writing about that, and sometimes other things. Older writings can be found on my Wordpress Blog, which is no longer in use because I hate QOL features being locked behind a paywall. Links to my Twitter, Twitch and Youtube channels can all be found in the sidebar, as well as on my links page.
